description: This file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as welcome, health check, documentation redirect, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for application health, documentation, and information.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message to verify the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects clients to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health check status.
